job_tasks.phrase: Als Liferay Developer draag je bij aan de realisatie van innovatieve digitale oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes contributing to the realization of digital solutions, which falls under the general scope of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk aan de ontwikkeling van een gebruiksvriendelijke website voor een academisch ziekenhuis of een platform met 270 sites voor internationale overheidsinstellingen.
job_tasks.justification: This provides specific examples of software development projects (website, platform), aligning with the definition of building and integrating software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan uitdagende projecten waar je technische expertise Ã©cht het verschil maakt.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working on challenging projects where technical expertise is applied, a common aspect of software development roles.

soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'innovative digital solutions' implies an understanding of business needs and strategic goals for creating these solutions.
The term 'innovative' suggests a focus on new ideas and solutions, aligning with innovation and potentially ownership of those solutions.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks related to building digital solutions and platforms using the Liferay framework. There is no mention of AI/ML models, Generative AI, or related specialized tasks, fitting the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role, focusing solely on Liferay development and digital solutions without any mention of AI/ML. This makes the classification straightforward and highly confident.
